column28: The method was improved by using two digits, representing the vertical disease progress and an estimate of severity. column28: Above-ground symptoms of root lesion nematodes are often indistinct and difficult to identify, but include poor vigor, stunted growth, poor tillering, and wilting in response to moisture stress.
